trans-unit.source: Signal Handling
trans-unit.target: 信号处理

trans-unit.source: Signal end of drag when the release pattern is triggered.
trans-unit.target: 当触发释放模式时,发出拖动结束的信号。

trans-unit.source: Signal the executor that it should free any resources that it is using when the currently pending futures are done executing. Calls to Executor.submit() and Executor.map() made after shutdown will raise RuntimeError.
trans-unit.target: 通知执行者，当当前未决的期货执行完毕时，它应该释放其正在使用的任何资源。关闭后对 Executor.submit() 和 Executor.map() 的调用将引发 RuntimeError 。

trans-unit.source: Signal the parser that the data stream is terminated. Unlike XMLParser.close(), this method always returns None. Any events not yet retrieved when the parser is closed can still be read with read_events().
trans-unit.target: 向解析器发送信号，告知数据流已终止。与 XMLParser.close() 不同，此方法始终返回 None 。关闭解析器时尚未检索到的任何事件仍可以使用 read_events() 读取。

trans-unit.source: Signaled whenever rounding discards digits; even if those digits are zero (such as rounding 5.00 to 5.0). If not trapped, returns the result unchanged. This signal is used to detect loss of significant digits.
trans-unit.target: 当舍入舍弃数字时发出信号；即使这些数字为零（例如将 5.00 舍入为 5.0 ）。如果未捕获，则返回结果不变。该信号用于检测有效数字的丢失。

trans-unit.source: Signals
trans-unit.target: Signals

trans-unit.source: Signals a test failure unconditionally, with msg or None for the error message.
trans-unit.target: 无条件地发出测试失败信号，错误消息为msg或 None 。

trans-unit.source: Signals and threads
trans-unit.target: 信号和线程

trans-unit.source: Signals are groups of exceptional conditions arising during the course of computation. Depending on the needs of the application, signals may be ignored, considered as informational, or treated as exceptions. The signals in the decimal module are: Clamped, InvalidOperation, DivisionByZero, Inexact, Rounded, Subnormal, Overflow, Underflow and FloatOperation.
trans-unit.target: 信号是在计算过程中出现的一组特殊情况。根据应用程序的需求，信号可能会被忽略，被认为是信息性的或被视为异常。十进制模块中的信号是： Clamped ， InvalidOperation ， DivisionByZero ， Inexact ， Rounded ， Subnormal ， Overflow ， Underflow 和 FloatOperation 。

trans-unit.source: Signals represent conditions that arise during computation. Each corresponds to one context flag and one context trap enabler.
trans-unit.target: 信号代表了计算过程中出现的条件,每个信号对应一个上下文标志和一个上下文陷阱使能器。每个信号对应一个上下文标志和一个上下文陷阱使能器。

trans-unit.source: Signals the division of a non-infinite number by zero.
trans-unit.target: 发出非无限数除以零的信号。

trans-unit.source: Signals the end of an element in namespace mode.
trans-unit.target: 标志着一个元素在命名空间模式下的结束。

trans-unit.source: Signals the end of an element in non-namespace mode.
trans-unit.target: 标志着一个元素在非命名空间模式下的结束。

trans-unit.source: Signals the start of an element in namespace mode.
trans-unit.target: 标志着一个元素在命名空间模式下的开始。

trans-unit.source: Signals the start of an element in non-namespace mode.
trans-unit.target: 标志着一个元素在非命名空间模式下的开始。

trans-unit.source: Signals when non-zero digits were discarded during rounding. The rounded result is returned. The signal flag or trap is used to detect when results are inexact.
trans-unit.target: 表示在四舍五入过程中放弃了非零的数字。返回四舍五入的结果。信号标志或陷阱用于检测结果不精确的情况。

trans-unit.source: Signature
trans-unit.target: Signature

trans-unit.source: Signature objects are immutable. Use Signature.replace() to make a modified copy.
trans-unit.target: 签名对象是不可变的。使用 Signature.replace() 制作修改后的副本。

trans-unit.source: Signatures themselves are restricted to the top level parameters expected by a method. For instance if a method expects one array of structs as a parameter, and it returns a string, its signature is simply “string, array”. If it expects three integers and returns a string, its signature is “string, int, int, int”.
trans-unit.target: 签名本身仅限于方法期望的顶级参数。例如，如果某个方法希望将一个结构数组作为参数，并且返回一个字符串，则其签名就是“字符串，数组”。如果期望三个整数并返回一个字符串，则其签名为“ string，int，int，int”。

trans-unit.source: Signed hexadecimal (lowercase).
trans-unit.target: 有符号的十六进制(小写)。

trans-unit.source: Signed hexadecimal (uppercase).
trans-unit.target: 有符号的十六进制(大写)。

trans-unit.source: Signed integer decimal.
trans-unit.target: 有符号的整数小数。

trans-unit.source: Signed octal value.
trans-unit.target: 签字的八进制值。

trans-unit.source: Signed, 16-bit audio, big-endian byte order (as used by 68k, PowerPC, Sparc)
trans-unit.target: 有符号的16位音频,大字节顺序(如68k、PowerPC、Sparc所使用的)。

trans-unit.source: Signed, 16-bit audio, little-endian byte order (as used by Intel processors)
trans-unit.target: 有符号的16位音频,小字节顺序(英特尔处理器使用的)。

trans-unit.source: Signed, 8 bit audio
trans-unit.target: 签名,8位音频

trans-unit.source: Signoff: commit changes, unlock mailbox, drop connection.
trans-unit.target: 签收:提交修改、解锁邮箱、放弃连接。

trans-unit.source: Silimarly, explicitly stating the standalone argument causes the standalone document declarations to be added to the prologue of the XML document. If the value is set to True, standalone=”yes” is added, otherwise it is set to “no”. Not stating the argument will omit the declaration from the document.
trans-unit.target: 毫无疑问，明确声明独立参数将导致独立文档声明被添加到XML文档的序言中。如果该值设置为 True ，则添加 standalone=”yes” ，否则将其设置为 “no” 。不声明参数将忽略文档中的声明。

trans-unit.source: Similar functionality (accepting only text string arguments, but more liberal towards whitespace) is also accessible using the bytes.fromhex() class method.
trans-unit.target: 也可以使用 bytes.fromhex() 类方法访问类似的功能（仅接受文本字符串参数，但对空格更为自由）。

trans-unit.source: Similar functionality (but returning a text string) is also conveniently accessible using the bytes.hex() method.
trans-unit.target: 也可以使用 bytes.hex() 方法方便地访问类似的功能（但返回文本字符串）。

trans-unit.source: Similar restrictions apply if a pool or manager is created in the main module.
trans-unit.target: 如果在主模块中创建了一个池或管理器,也适用类似的限制。

trans-unit.source: Similar to loop.create_server() but works with the AF_UNIX socket family.
trans-unit.target: 与 loop.create_server() 类似，但可与 AF_UNIX 套接字家族一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Similar to open_connection() but operates on Unix sockets.
trans-unit.target: 与 open_connection() 类似，但在Unix套接字上运行。

trans-unit.source: Similar to start_server() but works with Unix sockets.
trans-unit.target: 与 start_server() 类似，但可用于Unix套接字。

trans-unit.source: Similar to bisect_left(), but returns an insertion point which comes after (to the right of) any existing entries of x in a.
trans-unit.target: 类似于 bisect_left() ，但返回其自带后（到右侧）的任何现有条目的插入点X在一个。

trans-unit.source: Similar to insort_left(), but inserting x in a after any existing entries of x.
trans-unit.target: 类似于 insort_left() ，但插入X中一个的任何现有条目后X。

trans-unit.source: Similar to contextmanager(), but creates an asynchronous context manager.
trans-unit.target: 与 contextmanager() 类似，但创建一个异步上下文管理器。

trans-unit.source: Similar to contextmanager(), but creates an asynchronous context manager.
trans-unit.target: 与 contextmanager() 类似，但是创建一个异步上下文管理器。

trans-unit.source: Similar to redirect_stdout() but redirecting sys.stderr to another file or file-like object.
trans-unit.target: 与 redirect_stdout() 类似，但是将 sys.stderr 重定向到另一个文件或类似文件的对象。

trans-unit.source: Similar to border(), but both ls and rs are vertch and both ts and bs are horch. The default corner characters are always used by this function.
trans-unit.target: 与 border() 相似，但ls和rs均为vertch，ts和bs均为horch。此功能始终使用默认的转角字符。

trans-unit.source: Similar to handle_starttag(), but called when the parser encounters an XHTML-style empty tag (<img ... />). This method may be overridden by subclasses which require this particular lexical information; the default implementation simply calls handle_starttag() and handle_endtag().
trans-unit.target: 与 handle_starttag() 类似，但是在解析器遇到XHTML样式的空标记（ <img ... /> ）时调用。该方法可以被需要此特定词法信息的子类覆盖；默认实现只是调用 handle_starttag() 和 handle_endtag() 。

trans-unit.source: Similar to getch(), but the keypress will be echoed if it represents a printable character.
trans-unit.target: 与 getch() 相似，但是如果按键代表可打印的字符，则将回显按键。

trans-unit.source: Similar to posix_spawn() except that the system searches for the executable file in the list of directories specified by the PATH environment variable (in the same way as for execvp(3)).
trans-unit.target: 与 posix_spawn() 相似，除了系统在 PATH 环境变量指定的目录列表中搜索可执行文件（与 execvp(3) 相同）。

trans-unit.source: Similar to posix_spawn() except that the system searches for the executable file in the list of directories specified by the PATH environment variable (in the same way as for execvp(3)).
trans-unit.target: 与 posix_spawn() 相似，除了系统在 PATH 环境变量指定的目录列表中搜索可执行文件（与 execvp(3) 相同）。

trans-unit.source: Similar to waitpid(), except a 3-element tuple, containing the child’s process id, exit status indication, and resource usage information is returned. Refer to resource.getrusage() for details on resource usage information. The arguments to wait4() are the same as those provided to waitpid().
trans-unit.target: 与 waitpid() 相似，除了一个3元素元组之外，该元组包含子进程的ID，退出状态指示和资源使用信息。参考 resource 。 getrusage() 获取有关资源使用信息的详细信息。 wait4() 的参数与提供给 waitpid() 的参数相同。

trans-unit.source: Similar to waitpid(), except no process id argument is given and a 3-element tuple containing the child’s process id, exit status indication, and resource usage information is returned. Refer to resource.getrusage() for details on resource usage information. The option argument is the same as that provided to waitpid() and wait4().
trans-unit.target: 与 waitpid() 相似，不同之处在于未提供任何进程ID参数，并返回一个包含子进程ID，退出状态指示和资源使用信息的3元素元组。参考 resource 。 getrusage() 获取有关资源使用信息的详细信息。option参数与提供给 waitpid() 和 wait4() 的参数相同。

trans-unit.source: Similar to CLOCK_MONOTONIC, but provides access to a raw hardware-based time that is not subject to NTP adjustments.
trans-unit.target: 与 CLOCK_MONOTONIC 相似，但是可以访问不受NTP调整的基于硬件的原始时间。

trans-unit.source: Similar to clock_gettime() but return time as nanoseconds.
trans-unit.target: 与 clock_gettime() 类似，但返回时间为纳秒。

trans-unit.source: Similar to clock_settime() but set time with nanoseconds.
trans-unit.target: 与 clock_settime() 类似，但是将时间设置为纳秒。

trans-unit.source: Similar to monotonic(), but return time as nanoseconds.
trans-unit.target: 与 monotonic() 相似，但返回时间为纳秒。

trans-unit.source: Similar to perf_counter(), but return time as nanoseconds.
trans-unit.target: 与 perf_counter() 类似，但返回时间为纳秒。

trans-unit.source: Similar to process_time() but return time as nanoseconds.
trans-unit.target: 与 process_time() 类似，但返回时间为纳秒。

trans-unit.source: Similar to thread_time() but return time as nanoseconds.
trans-unit.target: 与 thread_time() 类似，但返回时间为纳秒。

trans-unit.source: Similar to time() but returns time as an integer number of nanoseconds since the epoch.
trans-unit.target: 与 time() 相似，但返回的时间是从epoch以来的整数纳秒。

trans-unit.source: Similar to loadTestsFromName(), but takes a sequence of names rather than a single name. The return value is a test suite which supports all the tests defined for each name.
trans-unit.target: 与 loadTestsFromName() 相似，但是采用名称序列而不是单个名称。返回值是一个测试套件，它支持为每个名称定义的所有测试。

trans-unit.source: Similar to BaseCGIHandler, but designed for use with HTTP origin servers. If you are writing an HTTP server implementation, you will probably want to subclass this instead of BaseCGIHandler.
trans-unit.target: 与 BaseCGIHandler 类似，但设计用于HTTP源服务器。如果您正在编写HTTP服务器实现，则可能需要将此子类替代 BaseCGIHandler 。

trans-unit.source: Similar to CGIHandler, but instead of using the sys and os modules, the CGI environment and I/O streams are specified explicitly. The multithread and multiprocess values are used to set the wsgi.multithread and wsgi.multiprocess flags for any applications run by the handler instance.
trans-unit.target: 与 CGIHandler 类似，但不使用 sys 和 os 模块，而是显式指定CGI环境和I / O流。在多线程和多进程值被用来设置 wsgi.multithread 和 wsgi.multiprocess 任何应用程序的处理程序实例中运行的标志。

trans-unit.source: Similar to request_uri(), except that the PATH_INFO and QUERY_STRING variables are ignored. The result is the base URI of the application object addressed by the request.
trans-unit.target: 与 request_uri() 相似，除了 PATH_INFO 和 QUERY_STRING 变量被忽略。结果是请求所寻址的应用程序对象的基本URI。

trans-unit.source: Similar to parse(), but parses from a buffer string received as a parameter. string must be a str instance or a bytes-like object.
trans-unit.target: 与 parse() 相似，但是从作为参数接收的缓冲区字符串中进行解析。字符串必须是 str 实例或类似字节的对象。

trans-unit.source: Similar to parse(), but parses from a buffer string received as a parameter. string must be a str instance or a bytes-like object.
trans-unit.target: 与 parse() 类似，但是从作为参数接收的缓冲区字符串中进行解析。字符串必须是 str 实例或类似字节的对象。

trans-unit.source: Similar to escape(), but also prepares data to be used as an attribute value. The return value is a quoted version of data with any additional required replacements. quoteattr() will select a quote character based on the content of data, attempting to avoid encoding any quote characters in the string. If both single- and double-quote characters are already in data, the double-quote characters will be encoded and data will be wrapped in double-quotes. The resulting string can be used directly as an attribute value:
trans-unit.target: 与 escape() 相似，但也准备将数据用作属性值。返回值是数据的带引号的版本，带有任何其他必需的替代项。 quoteattr() 将基于数据的内容选择一个引号字符，尝试避免对字符串中的任何引号字符进行编码。如果data中已经包含了单引号和双引号字符，则将对双引号字符进行编码，并将数据包装在双引号中。结果字符串可以直接用作属性值：

trans-unit.source: Similar to map(func, *iterables) except:
trans-unit.target: 与 map(func, *iterables) 类似，除了：

trans-unit.source: Similar to %U and %W, %V is only used in calculations when the day of the week and the ISO year (%G) are specified in a strptime() format string. Also note that %G and %Y are not interchangeable.
trans-unit.target: 类似 %U 和 %W ， %V 仅在计算时的星期几和ISO年份（使用 %G ）在指定 strptime() 格式字符串。另请注意， %G 和 %Y 不可互换。

trans-unit.source: Similar to 'g', except that fixed-point notation, when used, has at least one digit past the decimal point. The default precision is as high as needed to represent the particular value. The overall effect is to match the output of str() as altered by the other format modifiers.
trans-unit.target: 与 'g' 相似，不同之处在于使用定点表示法时，小数点后至少有一位数字。默认精度与表示特定值所需的精度一样高。总体效果是匹配其他格式修饰符更改的 str() 的输出。

trans-unit.source: Similar to callback() but expects a coroutine function.
trans-unit.target: 与 callback() 类似，但是需要一个协程函数。

trans-unit.source: Similar to close() but properly handles awaitables.
trans-unit.target: 与 close() 类似，但正确处理了waitings。

trans-unit.source: Similar to enter_context() but expects an asynchronous context manager.
trans-unit.target: 与 enter_context() 类似，但需要异步上下文管理器。

trans-unit.source: Similar to push() but expects either an asynchronous context manager or a coroutine function.
trans-unit.target: 与 push() 类似，但是需要异步上下文管理器或协程函数。

trans-unit.source: Similar to sorted(itertools.chain(*iterables)) but returns an iterable, does not pull the data into memory all at once, and assumes that each of the input streams is already sorted (smallest to largest).
trans-unit.target: 与 sorted(itertools.chain(*iterables)) 类似，但返回一个iterable，不会一次将数据全部拉入内存，并假定每个输入流都已排序（最小到最大）。

trans-unit.source: Similar to str.format(**mapping), except that mapping is used directly and not copied to a dict. This is useful if for example mapping is a dict subclass:
trans-unit.target: 与 str.format(**mapping) 相似，除了直接使用 mapping 而不将其复制到 dict 之外。例如，如果 mapping 是dict的子类，则这很有用：

trans-unit.source: Similar to Process IDs, Thread IDs are only valid (guaranteed unique system-wide) from the time the thread is created until the thread has been terminated.
trans-unit.target: 与进程ID类似,线程ID只有从线程创建到线程终止时才有效(保证全系统唯一)。

trans-unit.source: Similar to regular parentheses, but the substring matched by the group is accessible via the symbolic group name name. Group names must be valid Python identifiers, and each group name must be defined only once within a regular expression. A symbolic group is also a numbered group, just as if the group were not named.
trans-unit.target: 与常规括号类似，但是可以通过符号组名name来访问与组匹配的子字符串。组名必须是有效的Python标识符，并且每个组名必须在正则表达式中仅定义一次。符号组也是带编号的组，就像未命名该组一样。

trans-unit.source: Similar to the max() method, but the comparison is done using the absolute values of the operands.
trans-unit.target: 与 max() 方法类似，但是使用操作数的绝对值进行比较。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, when class instances are pickled, their class’s code and data are not pickled along with them. Only the instance data are pickled. This is done on purpose, so you can fix bugs in a class or add methods to the class and still load objects that were created with an earlier version of the class. If you plan to have long-lived objects that will see many versions of a class, it may be worthwhile to put a version number in the objects so that suitable conversions can be made by the class’s __setstate__() method.
trans-unit.target: 同样，当对类实例进行腌制时，其类的代码和数据也不会与其一起被腌制。仅实例数据被腌制。这样做是有意为之的，因此您可以修复类中的错误或向类中添加方法，并仍然加载使用该类的早期版本创建的对象。如果计划使用寿命很长的对象，而该对象将看到类的许多版本，则值得在对象中放入版本号，以便可以通过类的 __setstate__() 方法进行适当的转换。

trans-unit.source: Since registered callbacks are invoked in the reverse order of registration, this ends up behaving as if multiple nested with statements had been used with the registered set of callbacks. This even extends to exception handling - if an inner callback suppresses or replaces an exception, then outer callbacks will be passed arguments based on that updated state.
trans-unit.target: 由于已注册的回调是按照注册的相反顺序调用的，因此最终的行为就好像已将多个嵌套的 with 语句用于已注册的回调集。这甚至扩展到异常处理-如果内部回调抑制或替换异常，则将根据该更新状态将外部回调传递给参数。

trans-unit.source: Since registered callbacks are invoked in the reverse order of registration, this ends up behaving as if multiple nested with statements had been used with the registered set of callbacks. This even extends to exception handling - if an inner callback suppresses or replaces an exception, then outer callbacks will be passed arguments based on that updated state.
trans-unit.target: 由于注册的回调是按照注册的相反顺序调用的，因此最终的行为就好像在注册的一组回调中使用了多个嵌套的 with 语句。这甚至扩展到异常处理-如果内部回调抑制或替换异常，则外部回调将基于该更新状态传递自变量。

trans-unit.source: Since some set operations create new sets, the default mixin methods need a way to create new instances from an iterable. The class constructor is assumed to have a signature in the form ClassName(iterable). That assumption is factored-out to an internal classmethod called _from_iterable() which calls cls(iterable) to produce a new set. If the Set mixin is being used in a class with a different constructor signature, you will need to override _from_iterable() with a classmethod that can construct new instances from an iterable argument.
trans-unit.target: 由于某些集合操作会创建新集合，因此默认的mixin方法需要一种从迭代器创建新实例的方法。假定类构造函数具有 ClassName(iterable) 形式的签名。该假设被分解为称为 _from_iterable() 的内部类方法，该方法调用 cls(iterable) 以产生新的集合。如果在具有不同构造函数签名的类中使用 Set mixin，则需要使用可以从可迭代参数构造新实例的类方法重写 _from_iterable() 。

trans-unit.source: Since the document is treated as a “flat” stream of events, the document “tree” is implicitly traversed and the desired elements are found regardless of their depth in the tree. In other words, one does not need to consider hierarchical issues such as recursive searching of the document nodes, although if the context of elements were important, one would either need to maintain some context-related state (i.e. remembering where one is in the document at any given point) or to make use of the DOMEventStream.expandNode() method and switch to DOM-related processing.

trans-unit.source: So both ways of creating a unittest.TestSuite run instances of DocTestCase. This is important for a subtle reason: when you run doctest functions yourself, you can control the doctest options in use directly, by passing option flags to doctest functions. However, if you’re writing a unittest framework, unittest ultimately controls when and how tests get run. The framework author typically wants to control doctest reporting options (perhaps, e.g., specified by command line options), but there’s no way to pass options through unittest to doctest test runners.
trans-unit.target: 因此，创建 unittest.TestSuite 的两种方法都可以运行 DocTestCase 的实例。这很重要，因为有一个微妙的原因：当您自己运行 doctest 函数时，可以通过将选项标志传递给 doctest 函数来直接控制正在使用的 doctest 选项。但是，如果你正在写一个 unittest 框架， unittest ，最终在控制和测试得到的运行方式。框架作者通常希望控制 doctest 报告选项（例如，由命令行选项指定），但无法将选项通过 unittest 传递给 doctest 测试运行者。

trans-unit.source: Some non-standards-compliant messages may not be internally consistent about their multipart-edness. Such messages may have a Content-Type header of type multipart, but their is_multipart() method may return False. If such messages were parsed with the FeedParser, they will have an instance of the MultipartInvariantViolationDefect class in their defects attribute list. See email.errors for details.
trans-unit.target: 某些不符合标准的消息可能在内部对其多部分内容不一致。这样的消息可能具有multipart 类型的Content-Type头，但是它们的 is_multipart() 方法可能返回 False 。如果使用 FeedParser 解析了此类消息，则它们的缺陷属性列表中将具有 MultipartInvariantViolationDefect 类的实例。有关详细信息，请参见 email.errors 。

trans-unit.source: Some of this package’s functionality requires a functioning shared semaphore implementation on the host operating system. Without one, the multiprocessing.synchronize module will be disabled, and attempts to import it will result in an ImportError. See bpo-3770 for additional information.
trans-unit.target: 此软件包的某些功能需要在主机操作系统上正常运行共享信号灯实现。没有一个， multiprocessing.synchronize 模块将被禁用，尝试导入它会导致 ImportError 。有关其他信息，请参见bpo-3770。

trans-unit.source: Some operations are indeterminate and return NaN, or if the InvalidOperation signal is trapped, raise an exception. For example, 0/0 returns NaN which means “not a number”. This variety of NaN is quiet and, once created, will flow through other computations always resulting in another NaN. This behavior can be useful for a series of computations that occasionally have missing inputs — it allows the calculation to proceed while flagging specific results as invalid.
trans-unit.target: 某些操作不确定并返回 NaN ，或者如果捕获了 InvalidOperation 信号，则引发异常。例如， 0/0 返回 NaN ，表示“不是数字”。 NaN 的这种变化是安静的，一旦创建，它将流经其他计算，并始终产生另一个 NaN 。此行为对于偶尔缺少输入的一系列计算很有用-它允许在将特定结果标记为无效的同时继续进行计算。

trans-unit.source: Some operations are supported by several object types; in particular, practically all objects can be compared for equality, tested for truth value, and converted to a string (with the repr() function or the slightly different str() function). The latter function is implicitly used when an object is written by the print() function.
trans-unit.target: 一些对象类型支持某些操作。特别是，几乎所有对象都可以进行相等性比较，测试真值并转换为字符串（使用 repr() 函数或稍有不同的 str() 函数）。当由 print() 函数写入对象时，将隐式使用后一个函数。

trans-unit.source: Some options and methods for menus manipulate specific menu entries. Anytime a menu index is needed for an option or a parameter, you may pass in:
trans-unit.target: 菜单的一些选项和方法可以操作特定的菜单项。任何时候,当一个选项或一个参数需要菜单索引时,你可以通过。

trans-unit.source: Some options, like bg are synonyms for common options with long names (bg is shorthand for “background”). Passing the config() method the name of a shorthand option will return a 2-tuple, not 5-tuple. The 2-tuple passed back will contain the name of the synonym and the “real” option (such as ('bg', 'background')).
trans-unit.target: 有些选项（例如 bg )是带有长名称的常用选项的同义词（ bg 是“ background”的简写）。通过 config() 方法，速记选项的名称将返回2元组，而不是5元组。返回的2元组将包含同义词的名称和“真实”选项（例如 ('bg', 'background') ）。

trans-unit.source: Some other ways to execute the regression tests depend on what platform the tests are being executed on. On Unix, you can run make test at the top-level directory where Python was built. On Windows, executing rt.bat from your PCbuild directory will run all regression tests.
trans-unit.target: 执行回归测试的其他一些方式取决于在哪个平台上执行测试。在Unix上，可以在构建Python的顶级目录中运行make test。在Windows上，从 PCbuild 目录执行rt.bat将运行所有回归测试。

trans-unit.source: Some support for logging is available. Note, however, that the logging package does not use process shared locks so it is possible (depending on the handler type) for messages from different processes to get mixed up.
trans-unit.target: 提供了一些日志记录支持。但是请注意， logging 包不使用进程共享锁，因此（取决于处理程序类型）可能会混淆来自不同进程的消息。

trans-unit.source: Some systems do not indicate the truncated length of ancillary data items which have been only partially received. If an item appears to extend beyond the end of the buffer, recvmsg() will issue a RuntimeWarning, and will return the part of it which is inside the buffer provided it has not been truncated before the start of its associated data.
trans-unit.target: 一些系统没有指示仅部分接收到的辅助数据项的截短长度。如果某项似乎超出了缓冲区的末尾，则 recvmsg() 将发出 RuntimeWarning ，并返回其在缓冲区内部的部分，前提是该对象在关联数据开始之前没有被截断。

trans-unit.source: Some systems truncate nodename to 8 characters or to the leading component; a better way to get the hostname is socket.gethostname() or even socket.gethostbyaddr(socket.gethostname()).
trans-unit.target: 某些系统将 nodename 截断为8个字符或开头部分；获取主机名的更好方法是 socket.gethostname() 甚至 socket.gethostbyaddr(socket.gethostname()) 。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes a C api function expects a pointer to a data type as parameter, probably to write into the corresponding location, or if the data is too large to be passed by value. This is also known as passing parameters by reference.
trans-unit.target: 有时，C api函数希望将指向数据类型的指针作为参数，可能会写入相应的位置，或者如果数据太大而无法按值传递。这也称为通过引用传递参数。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes a script may only parse a few of the command-line arguments, passing the remaining arguments on to another script or program. In these cases, the parse_known_args() method can be useful. It works much like parse_args() except that it does not produce an error when extra arguments are present. Instead, it returns a two item tuple containing the populated namespace and the list of remaining argument strings.
trans-unit.target: 有时，脚本只能解析一些命令行参数，将其余的参数传递给另一个脚本或程序。在这些情况下， parse_known_args() 方法可能会很有用。它的工作原理与 parse_args() 相似，除了当存在额外的参数时它不会产生错误。相反，它返回一个包含已填充名称空间和剩余参数字符串列表的两元组。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes ctypes data instances do not own the memory block they contain, instead they share part of the memory block of a base object. The _b_base_ read-only member is the root ctypes object that owns the memory block.
trans-unit.target: 有时，ctypes数据实例并不拥有它们包含的存储块，而是共享一个基础对象的存储块的一部分。所述 _b_base_ 只读构件是根ctypes的对象拥有该存储器块。

trans-unit.target: 有时,能够重现伪随机数发生器给出的序列是很有用的。通过重新使用种子值,只要不是多个线程运行,相同的序列应该可以在运行中重现。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes when testing you need to test that a specific object is passed as an argument to another method, or returned. It can be common to create named sentinel objects to test this. sentinel provides a convenient way of creating and testing the identity of objects like this.
trans-unit.target: 有时，在测试时，您需要测试特定对象是否作为参数传递给另一个方法或已返回。创建命名的哨兵对象来对此进行测试是很常见的。 sentinel 提供了一种方便的方法来创建和测试这样的对象的身份。

Rather than repeating the definitions of these arguments, a single parser with all the shared arguments and passed to parents= argument to ArgumentParser can be used. The parents= argument takes a list of ArgumentParser objects, collects all the positional and optional actions from them, and adds these actions to the ArgumentParser object being constructed:

trans-unit.source: Sort has two arguments before the search_criterion argument(s); a parenthesized list of sort_criteria, and the searching charset. Note that unlike search, the searching charset argument is mandatory. There is also a uid sort command which corresponds to sort the way that uid search corresponds to search. The sort command first searches the mailbox for messages that match the given searching criteria using the charset argument for the interpretation of strings in the searching criteria. It then returns the numbers of matching messages.
trans-unit.target: Sort在search_criterion参数之前有两个参数；带括号的sort_criteria列表和搜索字符集。需要注意的是不同 search ，搜索字符集的说法是强制性的。还有一个 uid sort 相当于命令 sort 的方式 uid search 对应于 search 。该 sort 命令首先搜索匹配使用字符串的搜索标准的解释的字符集参数给定的搜索条件的邮件的邮箱。然后，它返回匹配消息的数量。

trans-unit.source: Source values are split into lines using splitlines(). If the value is not to be refolded, the lines are rejoined using the linesep from the policy and returned. The exception is lines containing non-ascii binary data. In that case the value is refolded regardless of the refold_source setting, which causes the binary data to be CTE encoded using the unknown-8bit charset.
trans-unit.target: 源值使用 splitlines() 分成几行。如果不希望重设该值，则使用策略中的 linesep 重新合并这些行并返回。例外是包含非ASCII二进制数据的行。在那种情况下，无论 refold_source 设置如何，都会重新折叠该值，这将导致使用 unknown-8bit 字符集对二进制数据进行CTE编码。

trans-unit.source: Special cases follow IEEE 754: in particular, remainder(x, math.inf) is x for any finite x, and remainder(x, 0) and remainder(math.inf, x) raise ValueError for any non-NaN x. If the result of the remainder operation is zero, that zero will have the same sign as x.
trans-unit.target: 特殊情况遵循IEEE 754：特别是，对于任何有限的x， remainder(x, math.inf) 为x，对于任何非NaN x， remainder(x, 0) 和 remainder(math.inf, x) 引发 ValueError 。如果余数运算的结果为零，则该零将具有与x相同的符号。

trans-unit.source: Special characters lose their special meaning inside sets. For example, [(+*)] will match any of the literal characters '(', '+', '*', or ')'.
trans-unit.target: 特殊字符在集合内失去其特殊含义。例如， [(+*)] 将匹配任何文字字符 '(' ， '+' ， '*' 或 ')' 。

trans-unit.source: Special functions
trans-unit.target: 特殊功能

trans-unit.source: Special reducer that can be defined in Pickler subclasses. This method has priority over any reducer in the dispatch_table. It should conform to the same interface as a __reduce__() method, and can optionally return NotImplemented to fallback on dispatch_table-registered reducers to pickle obj.
trans-unit.target: 可以在 Pickler 子类中定义的特殊reducer 。此方法的优先级高于 dispatch_table 中的任何reducer 。它应该与 __reduce__() 方法遵循相同的接口，并且可以选择将 NotImplemented 返回给 dispatch_table 注册的 reducers上的fallback 进行pickle obj 。

trans-unit.source: Special requirement for pickling: A tzinfo subclass must have an __init__() method that can be called with no arguments, otherwise it can be pickled but possibly not unpickled again. This is a technical requirement that may be relaxed in the future.
trans-unit.target: 腌制的特殊要求： tzinfo 子类必须具有 __init__() 方法，该方法可以不带任何参数地进行调用，否则可以对其进行腌制，但可能无法再次进行腌制。这是一项技术要求，将来可能会放宽。

trans-unit.source: Special requirement for pickling: A tzinfo subclass must have an __init__() method that can be called with no arguments, otherwise it can be pickled but possibly not unpickled again. This is a technical requirement that may be relaxed in the future.
trans-unit.target: 腌制的特殊要求： tzinfo 子类必须具有 __init__() 方法，该方法可以不带任何参数调用，否则可以进行腌制，但可能无法再次进行腌制。这是一项技术要求，将来可能会放宽。

trans-unit.source: Special type construct to mark class variables.
trans-unit.target: 用于标记类变量的特殊类型构造。

trans-unit.source: Special type indicating an unconstrained type.
trans-unit.target: 表示无约束类型的特殊类型。

trans-unit.source: Special type indicating that a function never returns. For example:
trans-unit.target: 表示函数永不返回的特殊类型。例如:

trans-unit.source: Special types
trans-unit.target: 特殊类型

trans-unit.source: Special typing primitives
trans-unit.target: 特殊类型基元

trans-unit.source: Special value that can be used as the stderr argument and indicates that standard error should be redirected into standard output.
trans-unit.target: 可以用作stderr参数的特殊值，它指示标准错误应重定向到标准输出。

trans-unit.source: Special value that can be used as the stderr argument to Popen and indicates that standard error should go into the same handle as standard output.
trans-unit.target: 可以用作 Popen 的stderr参数的特殊值，它指示标准错误应与标准输出进入同一句柄。

trans-unit.source: Special value that can be used as the stdin, stdout or stderr argument to Popen and indicates that a pipe to the standard stream should be opened. Most useful with Popen.communicate().
trans-unit.target: 可以用作 Popen 的stdin，stdout或stderr参数的特殊值，指示应打开到标准流的管道。对 Popen.communicate() 最有用。

trans-unit.source: Special value that can be used as the stdin, stdout or stderr argument to Popen and indicates that the special file os.devnull will be used.
trans-unit.target: 可以用作特殊值标准输入，标准输出或标准错误参数 Popen 并表示该特殊文件 os.devnull 将被使用。

trans-unit.source: Special value that can be used as the stdin, stdout or stderr argument to process creation functions. It indicates that the special file os.devnull will be used for the corresponding subprocess stream.
trans-unit.target: 可以用作流程创建函数的stdin，stdout或stderr参数的特殊值。它表示特殊文件 os.devnull 将用于相应的子流程流。

trans-unit.source: Special value which should be returned by the binary special methods (e.g. __eq__(), __lt__(), __add__(), __rsub__(), etc.) to indicate that the operation is not implemented with respect to the other type; may be returned by the in-place binary special methods (e.g. __imul__(), __iand__(), etc.) for the same purpose. Its truth value is true.
trans-unit.target: 这应该由二进制特殊方法返回特殊值（例如 __eq__() ， __lt__() ， __add__() ， __rsub__() ，等等），以指示该操作不相对于另一种类型的实施; 出于同一目的，可以通过就地二进制特殊方法（例如 __imul__() ， __iand__() 等）返回。它的真实价值是真实的。

trans-unit.source: Special value which should be returned by the binary special methods (e.g. __eq__(), __lt__(), __add__(), __rsub__(), etc.) to indicate that the operation is not implemented with respect to the other type; may be returned by the in-place binary special methods (e.g. __imul__(), __iand__(), etc.) for the same purpose. It should not be evaluated in a boolean context.
trans-unit.target: 这应该由二进制特殊方法返回特殊值（例如 __eq__() ， __lt__() ， __add__() ， __rsub__() ，等等），以指示该操作不相对于另一种类型的实施; 出于同一目的，可以通过就地二进制特殊方法（例如 __imul__() ， __iand__() 等）返回。不应在布尔上下文中对其进行评估。

trans-unit.source: Special values
trans-unit.target: 特殊值

trans-unit.source: Specialized version of sendmsg() for AF_ALG socket. Set mode, IV, AEAD associated data length and flags for AF_ALG socket.
trans-unit.target: 专业的版本 sendmsg() 为 AF_ALG 插座。设置模式，IV，AEAD关联的数据长度和 AF_ALG 套接字的标志。

trans-unit.source: Specialized versions of ref objects can be created through subclassing. This is used in the implementation of the WeakValueDictionary to reduce the memory overhead for each entry in the mapping. This may be most useful to associate additional information with a reference, but could also be used to insert additional processing on calls to retrieve the referent.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过子类创建 ref 对象的特殊版本。在 WeakValueDictionary 的实现中使用它来减少映射中每个条目的内存开销。这可能对将附加信息与引用相关联最有用，但也可以用于在调用中插入附加处理以检索引用对象。

trans-unit.source: Specializing JSON object decoding:
trans-unit.target: 专攻JSON对象解码。

trans-unit.source: Specific platforms listed alphabetically, with Linux included in the Unix section.
trans-unit.target: 具体平台按字母顺序排列,Unix部分包括Linux。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, this function supports strings in the format:
trans-unit.target: 具体来说,这个函数支持的字符串格式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a format string that should be used by send_error() method for building an error response to the client. The string is filled by default with variables from responses based on the status code that passed to send_error().
trans-unit.target: 指定 send_error() 方法应使用的格式字符串，以生成对客户端的错误响应。默认情况下，该字符串将根据传递给 send_error() 的状态码使用 responses 的变量填充。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a list of elements to place inside the element. Each element is a tuple (or other sequence type) where the first item is the layout name, and the other is a Layout.
trans-unit.target: 指定要放置在元素内部的元素列表。每个元素都是一个元组（或其他序列类型），其中第一项是布局名称，另一个是Layout。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a minimum height for the element. If less than zero, the base image’s height is used as a default.
trans-unit.target: 指定元素的最小高度。如果小于零，则默认使用基本图像的高度。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a minimum width for the element. If less than zero, the base image’s width is used as a default.
trans-unit.target: 指定元素的最小宽度。如果小于零，则默认使用基本图像的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a name whose value is linked to the widget value. Whenever the value associated with that name changes, the widget value is updated, and vice versa. See tkinter.StringVar.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个名称，该名称的值链接到窗口小部件值。每当与该名称关联的值更改时，小部件值都会更新，反之亦然。参见 tkinter.StringVar 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a name whose value will be used in place of the text option resource.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个名称,其值将用于代替文本选项资源。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a text string to be displayed inside the widget.
trans-unit.target: 指定要在小组件中显示的文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: Specifies a text to be displayed in the tab.
trans-unit.target: 指定要在标签中显示的文字。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an email.message.Message-like class to parse HTTP headers. Typically, this is not overridden, and it defaults to http.client.HTTPMessage.
trans-unit.target: 指定 email.message.Message 的类来解析HTTP标头。通常，不会覆盖它，并且默认为 http.client.HTTPMessage 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an image to display in the tab. See the option image described in Widget.
trans-unit.target: 指定要在选项卡中显示的图像。请参阅 Widget 中描述的选项图像。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an image to display to the right of the column heading.
trans-unit.target: 指定要显示在列标题右边的图像。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an image to display. This is a list of 1 or more elements. The first element is the default image name. The rest of the list if a sequence of statespec/value pairs as defined by Style.map(), specifying different images to use when the widget is in a particular state or a combination of states. All images in the list should have the same size.
trans-unit.target: 指定要显示的图像。这是1个或多个元素的列表。第一个元素是默认图像名称。列表的其余部分，如果是由 Style.map() 定义的一系列状态规范/值对，则指定在小部件处于特定状态或状态组合时要使用的不同图像。列表中的所有图像应具有相同的尺寸。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an input parameter to the function.
trans-unit.target: 指定函数的输入参数。

trans-unit.source: Specifies an integer value indicating the desired width of the entry window, in average-size characters of the widget’s font.
trans-unit.target: 指定一个整数值，以小部件字体的平均大小字符表示输入窗口的所需宽度。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the child window is positioned within the pane area. Value is a string containing zero or more of the characters “n”, “s”, “e” or “w”. Each letter refers to a side (north, south, east or west) that the child window will stick to, as per the grid() geometry manager.
trans-unit.target: 指定子窗口在窗格区域内的放置方式。值是一个包含零个或多个字符“ n”，“ s”，“ e”或“ w”的字符串。根据 grid() 几何管理器，每个字母都指向子窗口将要粘贴的一侧（北，南，东或西）。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the heading text should be aligned. One of the standard Tk anchor values.
trans-unit.target: 指定标题文字的排列方式。Tk标准锚值之一。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the image is placed within the final parcel. spec contains zero or more characters “n”, “s”, “w”, or “e”.
trans-unit.target: 指定如何在最终宗地中放置图像。spec包含零个或多个字符“ n”，“ s”，“ w”或“ e”。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the text in this column should be aligned with respect to the cell.
trans-unit.target: 指定此列中的文字相对于单元格的排列方式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the text is aligned within the widget. One of “left”, “center”, or “right”.
trans-unit.target: 指定文本在小部件内的对齐方式。“左”，“中心”或“右”之一。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how to display the image relative to the text, in the case both options text and image are present. See Label Options for legal values.
trans-unit.target: 指定在同时显示选项文本和图像的情况下如何显示相对于文本的图像。有关合法值，请参见标签选项。

trans-unit.source: Specifies how to display the image relative to the text, in the case both text and images options are present. Valid values are:
trans-unit.target: 指定在同时存在文本和图像选项的情况下,如何显示相对于文本的图像。有效值为:

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a FileHandler be created, using the specified filename, rather than a StreamHandler.
trans-unit.target: 指定使用指定的文件名创建一个FileHandler,而不是一个StreamHandler。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that exactly m copies of the previous RE should be matched; fewer matches cause the entire RE not to match. For example, a{6} will match exactly six 'a' characters, but not five.
trans-unit.target: 指定应该精确匹配前一个RE的m个副本；较少的匹配会导致整个RE不匹配。例如， a{6} 将精确匹配六个 'a' 字符，而不是五个。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the STARTUPINFO.hStdInput, STARTUPINFO.hStdOutput, and STARTUPINFO.hStdError attributes contain additional information.
trans-unit.target: 指定 STARTUPINFO.hStdInput ， STARTUPINFO.hStdOutput 和 STARTUPINFO.hStdError 属性包含其他信息。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the STARTUPINFO.wShowWindow attribute contains additional information.
trans-unit.target: 指定 STARTUPINFO.wShowWindow 属性包含其他信息。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the Content-Type HTTP header of error responses sent to the client. The default value is 'text/html'.
trans-unit.target: 指定发送到客户端的错误响应的Content-Type HTTP标头。默认值为 'text/html' 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the UUID layout given in RFC 4122.
trans-unit.target: 指定RFC 4122中给出的UUID布局。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the amount of extra space to add around the outside of the notebook. The padding is a list up to four length specifications left top right bottom. If fewer than four elements are specified, bottom defaults to top, right defaults to left, and top defaults to left.
trans-unit.target: 指定笔记本外侧要增加的额外空间。padding是一个列表,最多四个长度规格左上右下。如果指定的元素少于四个,底部默认为顶部,右侧默认为左侧,顶部默认为左侧。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the amount of extra space to add between the notebook and this pane. Syntax is the same as for the option padding used by this widget.
trans-unit.target: 指定要在笔记本和此窗格之间添加的额外空间数量。语法与此小组件使用的选项填充相同。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the cell or item background color.
trans-unit.target: 指定单元格或项目的背景色。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the element’s interior padding. Defaults to border’s value if not specified.
trans-unit.target: 指定元素的内部填充。如果未指定，则默认为border的值。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the font to use when drawing text.
trans-unit.target: 指定绘制文字时要使用的字体。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the height of the pop-down listbox, in rows.
trans-unit.target: 指定弹出式列表框的高度,以行为单位。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the index (0-based) of a character to underline in the text string. The underlined character is used for mnemonic activation if Notebook.enable_traversal() is called.
trans-unit.target: 指定要在文本字符串中加下划线的字符的索引（从0开始）。如果调用 Notebook.enable_traversal() ,则带下划线的字符用于助记符激活。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the internal padding for the widget. The padding is a list of up to four length specifications.
trans-unit.target: 指定小组件的内部填充物。padding是最多四个长度规格的列表。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the item image, in case the item’s image option is empty.
trans-unit.target: 如果项目的图像选项为空，则指定项目图像。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the length of the long axis of the progress bar (width if horizontal, height if vertical).
trans-unit.target: 指定进度条长轴的长度(横向为宽,纵向为高)。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the list of values to display in the drop-down listbox.
trans-unit.target: 指定要在下拉列表框中显示的值列表。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the mouse cursor to be used for the widget. If set to the empty string (the default), the cursor is inherited for the parent widget.
trans-unit.target: 指定小组件要使用的鼠标游标,如果设置为空字符串(默认值),则为父小组件继承鼠标游标。如果设置为空字符串(默认值),光标将被继承给父部件。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of rows which should be visible. Note: the requested width is determined from the sum of the column widths.
trans-unit.target: 指定可见的行数。注意:要求的宽度由列宽之和决定。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the server software version. You may want to override this. The format is multiple whitespace-separated strings, where each string is of the form name[/version]. For example, 'BaseHTTP/0.2'.
trans-unit.target: 指定服务器软件版本。您可能要覆盖它。格式是多个用空格分隔的字符串，其中每个字符串的格式均为名称[/ version]。例如， 'BaseHTTP/0.2' 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the text foreground color.
trans-unit.target: 指定文字前景色。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of each element in the array.
trans-unit.target: 指定数组中每个元素的类型。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type pointed to.
trans-unit.target: 指定指向的类型。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the window class. The class is used when querying the option database for the window’s other options, to determine the default bindtags for the window, and to select the widget’s default layout and style. This option is read-only, and may only be specified when the window is created.
trans-unit.target: 指定窗口类。在选项数据库中查询窗口的其他选项，确定窗口的默认绑定标签以及选择窗口小部件的默认布局和样式时，使用该类。此选项是只读的，只能在创建窗口时指定。

trans-unit.source: Specifies where the element is placed inside its allocated parcel.
trans-unit.target: 指定元素在其分配的包裹内的位置。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the column’s width should be adjusted when the widget is resized.
trans-unit.target: 指定在调整窗口小部件大小时是否应调整列的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Specifies which side of the cavity to place the element; one of top, right, bottom or left. If omitted, the element occupies the entire cavity.
trans-unit.target: 指定将元件放置在空腔的哪一侧;上、右、下或左之一。如果省略,则该元件占据整个空腔。

trans-unit.source: Specify a list of commands for breakpoint number bpnumber. The commands themselves appear on the following lines. Type a line containing just end to terminate the commands. An example:
trans-unit.target: 指定断点编号bpnumber的命令列表。命令本身出现在以下几行中。键入仅包含 end 的行以终止命令。一个例子：

trans-unit.source: Specify that the file descriptor fd be used for typeahead checking. If fd is -1, then no typeahead checking is done.
trans-unit.target: 指定文件描述符fd用于预输入检查。如果fd为 -1 ，则不进行预输入检查。

trans-unit.source: Specify the compression type. If not specified, the audio data will not be compressed. In AIFF files, compression is not possible. The name parameter should be a human-readable description of the compression type as a bytes array, the type parameter should be a bytes array of length 4. Currently the following compression types are supported: b'NONE', b'ULAW', b'ALAW', b'G722'.
trans-unit.target: 指定压缩类型。如果未指定，则不会压缩音频数据。在AIFF文件中，无法进行压缩。名称参数应该是人类可读的压缩类型的描述，以字节数组的形式出现，类型参数应该是长度为4的字节数组。当前支持以下压缩类型： b'NONE' ， b'ULAW' ， b'ALAW' ， b'G722' 。

trans-unit.source: Specify the number of channels in the audio file.
trans-unit.target: 指定音频文件的通道数。

trans-unit.source: Specify the number of frames that are to be written to the audio file. If this parameter is not set, or not set correctly, the file needs to support seeking.
trans-unit.target: 指定要写入音频文件的帧数。如果此参数没有设置,或者设置不正确,则文件需要支持寻找。

trans-unit.source: Specify the sampling frequency in frames per second.
trans-unit.target: 指定采样频率,单位为每秒一帧。

trans-unit.source: Specify the size in bytes of audio samples.
trans-unit.target: 指定音频样本的字节大小。

trans-unit.source: Specify what kind of code must be compiled, like the mode argument in parse().
trans-unit.target: 指定必须编译的代码类型，例如 parse() 中的mode参数。

trans-unit.source: Specify which protocols the socket should advertise during the SSL/TLS handshake. It should be a list of ASCII strings, like ['http/1.1', 'spdy/2'], ordered by preference. The selection of a protocol will happen during the handshake, and will play out according to RFC 7301. After a successful handshake, the SSLSocket.selected_alpn_protocol() method will return the agreed-upon protocol.
trans-unit.target: 指定套接字在SSL / TLS握手期间应通告的协议。它应该是按优先级排序的ASCII字符串列表，例如 ['http/1.1', 'spdy/2'] 。协议的选择将在握手期间进行，并根据RFC 7301进行播放。成功握手后， SSLSocket.selected_alpn_protocol() 方法将返回已同意的协议。

trans-unit.source: Specify which protocols the socket should advertise during the SSL/TLS handshake. It should be a list of strings, like ['http/1.1', 'spdy/2'], ordered by preference. The selection of a protocol will happen during the handshake, and will play out according to the Application Layer Protocol Negotiation. After a successful handshake, the SSLSocket.selected_npn_protocol() method will return the agreed-upon protocol.
trans-unit.target: 指定套接字在SSL / TLS握手期间应通告的协议。它应该是按优先级排序的字符串列表，例如 ['http/1.1', 'spdy/2'] 。协议的选择将在握手期间进行，并根据应用层协议协商进行。握手成功后， SSLSocket.selected_npn_protocol() 方法将返回已同意的协议。

trans-unit.source: Specifying a -k flag before the argument will search the synopsis lines of all available modules for the keyword given as the argument, again in a manner similar to the Unix man command. The synopsis line of a module is the first line of its documentation string.
trans-unit.target: 在参数之前指定 -k 标志将再次以类似于Unix man命令的方式在所有可用模块的提要行中搜索作为参数给出的关键字。模块的概要行是其文档字符串的第一行。

trans-unit.source: Specifying a -w flag before the argument will cause HTML documentation to be written out to a file in the current directory, instead of displaying text on the console.
trans-unit.target: 在参数前指定 -w 标志将导致HTML文档被写到当前目录中的文件中，而不是在控制台上显示文本。

trans-unit.source: Specifying a format protects against incompatible argument types (just as a prototype for a C function), and tries to convert the arguments to valid types:
trans-unit.target: 指定格式可以防止不兼容的参数类型(就像C函数的原型一样),并尝试将参数转换为有效类型。

trans-unit.source: Specifying an empty list for files will prevent the system defaults from being applied: only the well-known values will be present from a built-in list.
trans-unit.target: 为文件指定一个空列表将阻止应用系统默认值：内置列表中将仅显示众所周知的值。

trans-unit.source: Specifying any command resuming execution (currently continue, step, next, return, jump, quit and their abbreviations) terminates the command list (as if that command was immediately followed by end). This is because any time you resume execution (even with a simple next or step), you may encounter another breakpoint—which could have its own command list, leading to ambiguities about which list to execute.
trans-unit.target: 指定任何恢复执行的命令（当前为 continue ， step ， next ， return ， jump ， quit 及其缩写）将终止命令列表（就像该命令紧随其后是end一样）。这是因为任何时候恢复执行（即使是简单的下一步或步骤），都可能会遇到另一个断点，该断点可能具有自己的命令列表，这导致要执行哪个列表有歧义。

trans-unit.target: 指定自定义过滤器链

trans-unit.target: 指定解释者

trans-unit.target: 指定所需的参数类型(函数原型)

trans-unit.source: Speeds from 1 to 10 enforce increasingly faster animation of line drawing and turtle turning.
trans-unit.target: 速度从1到10,强制执行越来越快的线描和龟转的动画。

trans-unit.source: Spinbox
trans-unit.target: Spinbox

trans-unit.source: Split string by the occurrences of pattern. If capturing parentheses are used in pattern, then the text of all groups in the pattern are also returned as part of the resulting list. If maxsplit is nonzero, at most maxsplit splits occur, and the remainder of the string is returned as the final element of the list.
trans-unit.target: 通过出现模式来拆分字符串。如果在pattern中使用了捕获括号，那么模式中所有组的文本也将作为结果列表的一部分返回。如果maxsplit不为零，则最多会发生maxsplit分割，并将字符串的其余部分作为列表的最后一个元素返回。

trans-unit.source: Split the argument into words using str.split(), capitalize each word using str.capitalize(), and join the capitalized words using str.join(). If the optional second argument sep is absent or None, runs of whitespace characters are replaced by a single space and leading and trailing whitespace are removed, otherwise sep is used to split and join the words.
trans-unit.target: 使用 str.split() 将参数分解为单词，使用str.capitalize（）将每个单词大写，然后使用 str.capitalize() 将大写的单词连接 str.join() 。如果可选的第二个参数sep不存在或为 None ，则将空格字符的行替换为单个空格，并删除开头和结尾的空格，否则将使用sep分隔和合并单词。

trans-unit.source: Split the binary sequence into subsequences of the same type, using sep as the delimiter string. If maxsplit is given and non-negative, at most maxsplit splits are done (thus, the list will have at most maxsplit+1 elements). If maxsplit is not specified or is -1, then there is no limit on the number of splits (all possible splits are made).
trans-unit.target: 使用sep作为分隔符字符串，将二进制序列拆分为相同类型的子序列。如果给定了maxsplit且非负数，则最多完成maxsplit个拆分（因此，列表中最多包含 maxsplit+1 个元素）。如果未指定maxsplit或为 -1 ，则分割数没有限制（已进行所有可能的分割）。

trans-unit.source: Split the binary sequence into subsequences of the same type, using sep as the delimiter string. If maxsplit is given, at most maxsplit splits are done, the rightmost ones. If sep is not specified or None, any subsequence consisting solely of ASCII whitespace is a separator. Except for splitting from the right, rsplit() behaves like split() which is described in detail below.
trans-unit.target: 使用sep作为分隔符字符串，将二进制序列拆分为相同类型的子序列。如果给出了maxsplit，则最多完成maxsplit拆分，最右边的拆分完成。如果未指定sep或 None ，则仅由ASCII空格组成的任何子序列都是分隔符。除了从右侧拆分外， rsplit() 的行为类似于 split() ，下面将对其进行详细说明。

trans-unit.source: Split the pathname path into a pair (drive, tail) where drive is either a mount point or the empty string. On systems which do not use drive specifications, drive will always be the empty string. In all cases, drive + tail will be the same as path.
trans-unit.target: 将路径名路径拆分为一对 (drive, tail) ，其中驱动器是安装点或空字符串。在不使用驱动器规格的系统上，驱动器将始终为空字符串。在所有情况下， drive + tail 将与path相同。

trans-unit.source: Split the pathname path into a pair (root, ext) such that root + ext == path, and ext is empty or begins with a period and contains at most one period. Leading periods on the basename are ignored; splitext('.cshrc') returns ('.cshrc', '').
trans-unit.target: 将路径名path分成一对 (root, ext) ，使 root + ext == path ，并且ext为空或以一个句点开头，并且最多包含一个句点。基本名称的前导句号将被忽略； splitext('.cshrc') ('.cshrc', '') ）返回（'.cshrc'，''）。

trans-unit.source: Split the pathname path into a pair, (head, tail) where tail is the last pathname component and head is everything leading up to that. The tail part will never contain a slash; if path ends in a slash, tail will be empty. If there is no slash in path, head will be empty. If path is empty, both head and tail are empty. Trailing slashes are stripped from head unless it is the root (one or more slashes only). In all cases, join(head, tail) returns a path to the same location as path (but the strings may differ). Also see the functions dirname() and basename().
trans-unit.target: 将路径名路径拆分为一对， (head, tail) ，其中，尾是路径名的最后一个组成部分，而头是通向该路径的所有内容。在尾部部分永远不会包含一个斜杠;如果路径以斜线结尾，则尾巴将为空。如果path中没有斜线，head将为空。如果路径为空，则头和尾均为空。结尾的斜杠从剥离头，除非它是根（仅一个或多个斜线）。在所有情况下， join(head, tail) 返回的路径与路径（但字符串可能有所不同）。另请参见函数 dirname() 和 basename() 。

trans-unit.source: Split the sequence at the first occurrence of sep, and return a 3-tuple containing the part before the separator, the separator itself or its bytearray copy, and the part after the separator. If the separator is not found, return a 3-tuple containing a copy of the original sequence, followed by two empty bytes or bytearray objects.
trans-unit.target: 在第一次出现sep时拆分序列，并返回一个三元组，其中包含分隔符之前的部分，分隔符本身或其字节数组副本以及分隔符之后的部分。如果找不到分隔符，则返回一个包含原始序列副本的3元组，后跟两个空字节或bytearray对象。

trans-unit.source: Split the sequence at the last occurrence of sep, and return a 3-tuple containing the part before the separator, the separator itself or its bytearray copy, and the part after the separator. If the separator is not found, return a 3-tuple containing two empty bytes or bytearray objects, followed by a copy of the original sequence.
trans-unit.target: 在最后一次出现sep时拆分序列，并返回一个三元组，其中包含分隔符之前的部分，分隔符本身或其字节数组副本以及分隔符之后的部分。如果找不到分隔符，则返回一个包含两个空字节或字节数组对象的3元组，后跟原始序列的副本。

trans-unit.source: Split the string s using shell-like syntax. If comments is False (the default), the parsing of comments in the given string will be disabled (setting the commenters attribute of the shlex instance to the empty string). This function operates in POSIX mode by default, but uses non-POSIX mode if the posix argument is false.
trans-unit.target: 拆分字符串小号使用shell的语法。如果注释为 False （默认值），则将禁用对给定字符串中注释的解析（将 shlex 实例的 commenters 属性设置为空字符串）。默认情况下，此函数在POSIX模式下运行，但如果posix参数为false ，则使用非POSIX模式。

trans-unit.source: Split the string at the first occurrence of sep, and return a 3-tuple containing the part before the separator, the separator itself, and the part after the separator. If the separator is not found, return a 3-tuple containing the string itself, followed by two empty strings.
trans-unit.target: 在第一次出现sep时分割字符串，并返回一个三元组，其中包含分隔符之前的部分，分隔符本身以及分隔符之后的部分。如果找不到分隔符，则返回一个包含字符串本身的3元组，然后是两个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Split the string at the last occurrence of sep, and return a 3-tuple containing the part before the separator, the separator itself, and the part after the separator. If the separator is not found, return a 3-tuple containing two empty strings, followed by the string itself.
trans-unit.target: 在最后一次出现sep时分割字符串，并返回一个三元组，其中包含分隔符之前的部分，分隔符本身以及分隔符之后的部分。如果找不到分隔符，则返回一个包含两个空字符串的三元组，然后是字符串本身。

trans-unit.target: 开始跟踪Python内存分配：在Python内存分配器上安装钩子。跟踪收集的回溯将限于nframe帧。默认情况下，内存块的迹线仅存储最新的帧：限制为 1 。nframe必须大于或等于 1 。

trans-unit.source: Starting from Python 3.8 all functions involving a file copy (copyfile(), copy(), copy2(), copytree(), and move()) may use platform-specific “fast-copy” syscalls in order to copy the file more efficiently (see bpo-33671). “fast-copy” means that the copying operation occurs within the kernel, avoiding the use of userspace buffers in Python as in “outfd.write(infd.read())”.
trans-unit.target: 从Python 3.8开始，涉及文件复制的所有函数（ copyfile() ， copy() ， copy2() ， copytree() 和 move() ）都可以使用特定于平台的“快速复制”系统调用来复制更多文件有效（请参阅bpo-33671）。“快速复制”意味着复制操作在内核内进行，避免像在“ outfd.write(infd.read()) ”中那样在Python中使用用户空间缓冲区。

trans-unit.target: 从版本3.5开始，双端队列支持 __add__() ， __mul__() 和 __imul__() 。

trans-unit.source: Starting with Python 3.4, __del__() methods no longer prevent reference cycles from being garbage collected, and module globals are no longer forced to None during interpreter shutdown. So this code should work without any issues on CPython.
trans-unit.target: 从Python 3.4开始， __del__() 方法不再阻止对参考循环进行垃圾收集，并且在解释器关闭期间不再将模块全局变量强制为 None 。因此，此代码应该可以在CPython上正常工作。

trans-unit.source: Starts up a socket server on the specified port, and listens for new configurations. If no port is specified, the module’s default DEFAULT_LOGGING_CONFIG_PORT is used. Logging configurations will be sent as a file suitable for processing by dictConfig() or fileConfig(). Returns a Thread instance on which you can call start() to start the server, and which you can join() when appropriate. To stop the server, call stopListening().

trans-unit.source: Sticky bit. When this bit is set on a directory it means that a file in that directory can be renamed or deleted only by the owner of the file, by the owner of the directory, or by a privileged process.
trans-unit.target: 粘性位。当该位被设置在一个目录上时,意味着该目录中的文件只能由文件的所有者、目录的所有者或有特权的进程来重命名或删除。

trans-unit.source: Stop a running program.
trans-unit.target: 停止正在运行的程序。

trans-unit.source: Stop after one line of code.
trans-unit.target: 一行代码后停止。

trans-unit.source: Stop all active patches. Only stops patches started with start.
trans-unit.target: 停止所有活动的补丁程序。仅停止以 start 开头的补丁。

trans-unit.source: Stop autoincrement mode: cancels any recurring timer event initiated by Progressbar.start() for this progress bar.
trans-unit.target: 停止自动递增模式：取消此进度条由 Progressbar.start() 启动的任何重复计时器事件。

trans-unit.source: Stop collecting profiling data and record the results internally as the current profile.
trans-unit.target: 停止收集剖析数据,并将结果作为当前剖析结果在内部记录。

trans-unit.source: Stop collecting profiling data. Only in cProfile.
trans-unit.target: 停止收集分析数据。仅在 cProfile 中。

trans-unit.source: Stop monitoring the fd file descriptor for read availability.
trans-unit.target: 停止监视fd文件描述符的读取可用性。

trans-unit.source: Stop monitoring the fd file descriptor for write availability.
trans-unit.target: 停止监视fd文件描述符的写可用性。

trans-unit.source: Stop on the next line in or below the given frame.
trans-unit.target: 在给定框内或下方的下一行停止。

trans-unit.source: Stop only at breakpoints or when finished. If there are no breakpoints, set the system trace function to None.
trans-unit.target: 仅在断点或完成时停止。如果没有断点，请将系统跟踪功能设置为 None 。

trans-unit.source: Stop playing all instances of the specified sound.
trans-unit.target: 停止播放指定声音的所有实例。

trans-unit.source: Stop recording the vertices of a polygon. Current turtle position is last vertex of polygon. This will be connected with the first vertex.
trans-unit.target: 停止记录多边形的顶点。当前海龟的位置是多边形的最后一个顶点。这将与第一个顶点相连。

trans-unit.source: Stop serving: close listening sockets and set the sockets attribute to None.
trans-unit.target: 停止提供服务：关闭监听套接字，并将 sockets 属性设置为 None 。

trans-unit.source: Stop the child process.
trans-unit.target: 停止儿童进程。

trans-unit.source: Stop the child. On POSIX OSs the method sends SIGTERM to the child. On Windows the Win32 API function TerminateProcess() is called to stop the child.
trans-unit.target: 阻止孩子 在POSIX操作系统上，该方法将SIGTERM发送给子级。在Windows上，将调用Win32 API函数 TerminateProcess() 来停止子级。

trans-unit.source: Stop the child. On Posix OSs the method sends SIGTERM to the child. On Windows the Win32 API function TerminateProcess() is called to stop the child.
trans-unit.target: 阻止孩子 在Posix OS上，该方法将SIGTERM发送给子级。在Windows上，将调用Win32 API函数 TerminateProcess() 来停止子级。

trans-unit.source: Stop the event loop.
trans-unit.target: 停止事件循环。

trans-unit.source: Stop the process used by the manager. This is only available if start() has been used to start the server process.
trans-unit.target: 停止管理器使用的过程。仅当使用 start() 启动服务器进程时，此选项才可用。

trans-unit.source: Stop the subprocess.
trans-unit.target: 停止子进程。

trans-unit.source: Stop the test run on the first error or failure.
trans-unit.target: 在第一次出现错误或失败时停止测试运行。

trans-unit.source: Stop the timer, and cancel the execution of the timer’s action. This will only work if the timer is still in its waiting stage.
trans-unit.target: 停止计时器，并取消执行计时器的操作。仅当计时器仍处于等待阶段时，此功能才起作用。

trans-unit.source: Stop tracing Python memory allocations: uninstall hooks on Python memory allocators. Also clears all previously collected traces of memory blocks allocated by Python.
trans-unit.target: 停止跟踪Python内存分配:卸载Python内存分配器上的钩子。同时清除之前收集的所有Python分配的内存块的痕迹。

trans-unit.source: Stop watching a file descriptor for read availability.
trans-unit.target: 停止观察文件描述符的读取可用性。

trans-unit.source: Stop watching a file descriptor for write availability.
trans-unit.target: 停止观察文件描述符的写入可用性。

trans-unit.source: Stop when returning from the given frame.
trans-unit.target: 从给定的帧返回时停止。

trans-unit.source: Stop when the line with the line no greater than the current one is reached or when returning from current frame.
trans-unit.target: 当到达不大于当前线的线或从当前帧返回时停止。

trans-unit.source: StopAsyncIteration
trans-unit.target: StopAsyncIteration

trans-unit.source: StopIteration
trans-unit.target: StopIteration

trans-unit.source: Stops the listener.
trans-unit.target: 停止听众。

trans-unit.source: Stops the listening server which was created with a call to listen(). This is typically called before calling join() on the return value from listen().
trans-unit.target: 停止通过调用 listen() 创建的监听服务器。通常在对 listen() 的返回值调用 join() 之前调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Stops the worker processes immediately without completing outstanding work. When the pool object is garbage collected terminate() will be called immediately.
trans-unit.target: 没有完成出色的工作，立即停止工作进程。当池对象被垃圾回收时，将立即调用 terminate() 。

trans-unit.source: Store a file in ASCII transfer mode. cmd should be an appropriate STOR command (see storbinary()). Lines are read until EOF from the file objectfp (opened in binary mode) using its readline() method to provide the data to be stored. callback is an optional single parameter callable that is called on each line after it is sent.
trans-unit.target: 以ASCII传输模式存储文件。cmd应该是适当的 STOR 命令（请参阅 storbinary() ）。使用文件行fp的 readline() 方法从文件对象fp（以二进制模式打开）读取行直到EOF，以提供要存储的数据。回调是一个可选的可调用单个参数，它在发送后在每一行中被调用。

trans-unit.source: Store a file in binary transfer mode. cmd should be an appropriate STOR command: "STOR filename". fp is a file object (opened in binary mode) which is read until EOF using its read() method in blocks of size blocksize to provide the data to be stored. The blocksize argument defaults to 8192. callback is an optional single parameter callable that is called on each block of data after it is sent. rest means the same thing as in the transfercmd() method.
trans-unit.target: 以二进制传输模式存储文件。cmd应该是适当的 STOR 命令： "STOR filename" 。fp是一个文件对象（以二进制模式打开），在使用大小为块大小的块中的 read() 方法进行EOF之前，该文件对象将被读取以提供要存储的数据。该块大小参数默认为8192。回调是一个可选的单参数调用它被发送后调用数据的每块上。rest的含义与 transfercmd() 方法相同。

trans-unit.source: Store a file in binary transfer mode. cmd should be an appropriate STOR command: "STOR filename". fp is a file object (opened in binary mode) which is read until EOF using its read() method in blocks of size blocksize to provide the data to be stored. The blocksize argument defaults to 8192. callback is an optional single parameter callable that is called on each block of data after it is sent. rest means the same thing as in the transfercmd() method.
trans-unit.target: 以二进制传输模式存储文件。cmd应该是适当的 STOR 命令： "STOR filename" 。fp是一个文件对象（以二进制模式打开），在使用大小为块大小的块中的 read() 方法进行EOF之前，该文件对象将被读取，以提供要存储的数据。该块大小参数默认为8192。回调是一个可选的单参数调用它被发送后调用数据的每块上。rest表示与 transfercmd() 方法相同的东西。

trans-unit.source: Store a file in line mode. cmd should be an appropriate STOR command (see storbinary()). Lines are read until EOF from the file objectfp (opened in binary mode) using its readline() method to provide the data to be stored. callback is an optional single parameter callable that is called on each line after it is sent.
trans-unit.target: 以行模式存储文件。cmd应该是适当的 STOR 命令（请参阅 storbinary() ）。使用文件行fp的 readline() 方法从文件对象fp（以二进制模式打开）读取行直到EOF，以提供要存储的数据。回调是一个可选的可调用单个参数，在发送后在每一行调用。

trans-unit.source: Store the value from stdout. It is meant to hold the stdout at the time the regrtest began.
trans-unit.target: 存储来自stdout的值。它旨在在重新测试开始时保持标准输出。

trans-unit.source: Stores TOS into the cell contained in slot i of the cell and free variable storage.
trans-unit.target: 将TOS存储到单元的插槽i中包含的单元中，并存储自由变量。

trans-unit.source: Stores TOS into the local co_varnames[var_num].
trans-unit.target: 将TOS存储到本地 co_varnames[var_num] 。

trans-unit.source: Stores data in the value field of an open registry key.
trans-unit.target: 在打开的注册表键的值域中存储数据。

trans-unit.source: Storing exc_value using a custom hook can create a reference cycle. It should be cleared explicitly to break the reference cycle when the exception is no longer needed.
trans-unit.target: 使用自定义钩子存储exc_value可以创建参考周期。当不再需要异常时，应明确清除它以打破参考周期。

trans-unit.source: Storing object using a custom hook can resurrect it if it is set to an object which is being finalized. Avoid storing object after the custom hook completes to avoid resurrecting objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果将其设置为最终确定的对象，则使用自定义钩子存储对象可以使它复活。避免在自定义钩子完成后存储对象，以免复活对象。

trans-unit.source: Storing thread using a custom hook can resurrect it if it is set to an object which is being finalized. Avoid storing thread after the custom hook completes to avoid resurrecting objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果将自定义钩子存储到最终确定的对象，则使用自定义钩子存储线程可以使它复活。避免在自定义钩子完成后存储线程，以免复活对象。

trans-unit.source: Storing more frames increases the memory and CPU overhead of the tracemalloc module. Use the get_tracemalloc_memory() function to measure how much memory is used by the tracemalloc module.
trans-unit.target: 存储更多帧会增加 tracemalloc 模块的内存和CPU开销。使用 get_tracemalloc_memory() 函数可以测量 tracemalloc 模块使用了多少内存。

trans-unit.source: Storing more than 1 frame is only useful to compute statistics grouped by 'traceback' or to compute cumulative statistics: see the Snapshot.compare_to() and Snapshot.statistics() methods.
trans-unit.target: 存储多于 1 帧仅对计算按 'traceback' 分组的统计信息或对累积统计信息有用：请参阅 Snapshot.compare_to() 和 Snapshot.statistics() 方法。

trans-unit.source: Storing the exception value (cm.unraisable.exc_value) creates a reference cycle. The reference cycle is broken explicitly when the context manager exits.
trans-unit.target: 存储异常值（ cm.unraisable.exc_value ）创建一个参考周期。当上下文管理器退出时，引用周期被明确中断。

trans-unit.source: Storing the object (cm.unraisable.object) can resurrect it if it is set to an object which is being finalized. Exiting the context manager clears the stored object.
trans-unit.target: 如果将对象（ cm.unraisable.object ）设置为最终确定的对象，则可以恢复该对象。退出上下文管理器将清除存储的对象。

trans-unit.source: Streams are high-level async/await-ready primitives to work with network connections. Streams allow sending and receiving data without using callbacks or low-level protocols and transports.
